entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No icon generated for older Android Devices #7556
  • [IOS bug] string.Replace always returns null #7555
  • Resizetizer has an empty error with an invalid file name #7554
  • [iOS] Shell.SearchHandler crashes the app #7553
  • [IOS] Make MauiWebViewNavigationDelegate public methods virtual #7551
  • Migrate Android Shell over to using all the same platform structures as non-shell #7550
    .NET 7
  • Incompatible ButtonHandler when embedding MAUI page in .NET Android-project #7549
  • Move Compatibility Project out to a separate nuget/workload #7548
    .NET 7
  • Changing Button Background and TextColor in Pressed and Released events not Updating Properly[Windows] #7543
  • Give developers more (full) control over control colors #7542
  • [BUG IOS] Cancel prompt in WebView will crash the app #7541
  • [Windows] Border removes child when using Line, PolyLine, Polygon as StrokeShape #7538
  • VerticalOptions doesn't work inside a layout. #7537
  • Verify all open issues from Xamarin.Forms in MAUI #7536
  • Arrange on Layouts not respecting correctly the passed bounding Rect #7535
  • $SolutionDir incorrectly maps to $ProjectDir when deploying to iOS (simulator) #7534
  • Measure not working correctly on Layouts with fixed size constraints #7531
  • No documentation for Maui-specific tags introduced in .csproj projects #7525
  • Border does not grow when editor inside it grows #7524
  • ScrollView Orientation dynamic change not working in Android #7523
  • GotoAsync not working after executing PushModalAsync in .Net MAUI #7522
  • [Bug] Strange Border with StrokeThickness and Clipped Content #7521
  • FlyoutPage issues in Android and iOS Tablets #7520

Closed

  • [Android] ListView crashes when navigating to another tab and back #7513
  • Not able to switch simulator when enabling MAUI embedding in .NET iOS-project #7540
  • can maui execute code using interperter mode for upload app to appstore? #7516
  • Bring back TabbedPageRenderer on WinUI #1332
  • ListView crashes on scrolling through 9,100 items #7530
  • IOS does not work with Blazor app and SQL Lite #7529
  • [Android]: Prevent Entry from losing focus when touch to another child of the ViewGroup is performed #5916
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Propagate semantics to CV Item container #7539
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Bump System.Memory from 4.5.4 to 4.5.5 #7533
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.8 to 4.13.2 #7532
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix issue with CheckBox colors #7527
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [iOS] Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange method in lifecycle events #7526
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Just a small styling error I noticed just now #7519
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.3xx-sr1

Merged

  • Set GenerateDocumentationFile=true for Compatibility and Xaml and pack a special docs artifact #7511
    area/docs 📓
  • If the FlyoutBehavior is "Flyout" show toolbar #7544
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #7517
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Merge the PublicAPI checker into main #7339
    p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Align the controls used in the different templates #7439
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Return VER for PlatformView #7509
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix Button CornerRadius issue #7215
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Avoid crash with invalid cast using RadioButtonGroup.GroupName with a View #7438
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Better handle disappearing content with ViewPager2 #7425
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fill ScrollView when content is smaller than viewport #7514
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Correctly notify CheckBox Color changes #7084
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
